title: Net force on uncharged conductor in electric field

content.prompt: Which of the following is true about the net force on an uncharged conducting sphere in a uniform electric field?

choices.label: It is in the direction of the field.
It is in the direction opposite to the field.
It produces a torque on the sphere about the direction of the field.
It causes the sphere to oscillate about an equilibrium position.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
